## Active Technologies
- Python 3.10+ + streamlit, requests, python-dotenv (existing: fastapi, uvicorn, nuclia) (002-streamlit-web-ui)
- In-memory session state (Streamlit st.session_state) - no persistent storage (002-streamlit-web-ui)

- Python 3.12+ + `nuclia`, `python-dotenv`, `fastapi`, `uvicorn`, `click` (001-api-cli-chatbot)
